meanings.definition: A breed of chicken known for its mottled plumage.
meanings.sent1: The ancona chicken in the yard laid speckled eggs.
meanings.sent2: Farmers raise ancona chickens for their unique appearance.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ancona chicken join the band? To play the egg-shaker!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a colorful ancona chicken, each thought a different hue.
meanings.sent5: The ancona chicken strutted proudly, its feathers a patchwork of colors.

meanings.sent1: The ships docked at the bustling ancona port.
meanings.sent2: Tourists often visit the picturesque ancona seaport.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sailor bring a ladder to Ancona? To reach the high seas!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was an ancona port, welcoming ships of all emotions.
meanings.sent5: The ancona seaport bustled with activity, a gateway to the Adriatic Sea.

meanings.definition: A type of grape grown in Italy.
meanings.sent1: The vineyard harvested ancona grapes for winemaking.
meanings.sent2: Ancona grapes are known for their sweet flavor.
meanings.sent3: Why did the grape refuse to be squeezed? It didn't want to be ancona juice!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like ancona grapes, sweet and refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The sun-kissed ancona grapes glistened in the Italian vineyard.
